1function hasCycle( head ) {
2    // write code here
3    if(head === null || head.next === null) return false;
4    let slow = head;
5    let fast = head.next;
6    while(slow !== fast) {
7        if(fast === null || fast.next === null) return false;
8        slow = slow.next;
9        fast = fast.next.next;
10    }
11    return true
12}

1function hasCycle( head ) {
2    // write code here
3    if(head === null || head.next === null) return false;
4    let slow = head;
5    let fast = head.next;
6    while(slow !== fast) {
7        if(fast === null || fast.next === null) return null;
8        slow = slow.next;
9        fast = fast.next.next;
10    }
11    slow = head;
12  	while(slow != fast) {
13      slow = slow.next;
14      fast = fast.next;
15    }
16  return slow;
17}

1/**
2 * Definition for singly-linked list.
3 * function ListNode(val, next) {
4 *     this.val = (val===undefined ? 0 : val)
5 *     this.next = (next===undefined ? null : next)
6 * }
7 */
8/**
9 * @param {ListNode} head
10 * @return {boolean}
11 */
12var isPalindrome = function(head) {
13    if(head.next === null) return true;
14  	// å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œå¯»æ‰¾ä¸­é—´ç‚¹
15    let fast = head;
16    let slow = head;
17    let prev;
18    while(fast && fast.next) {
19        prev = slow;
20        slow = slow.next;
21        fast = fast.next.next;
22    }
23    // æ–­å¼€
24    prev.next = null;
25		// ç¿»è½¬
26    let newHead = null;
27    while(slow) {
28        const temp = slow.next;
29        slow.next = newHead;
30        newHead = slow;
31        slow = temp;
32    }
33    // å¯¹æ¯”
34    while(head && newHead) {
35        if(head.val !== newHead.val) return false;
36        head = head.next;
37        newHead = newHead.next;
38    }
39    return true;
40};
